channel.title: Comments on: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians

item.title: By: Chris Kindle
item.dc:creator: Chris Kindle
item.description: Just came across your blog on Google. Interesting post, you bring up a few good things to think about. Good luck with the blog.
item.content:encoded: Just came across your blog on Google. Interesting post, you bring up a few good things to think about. Good luck with the blog.

item.title: By: Mickey Grackin
item.dc:creator: Mickey Grackin
item.description: So did you buy the Santa Claus movie? I'm curious to know how bad it really was.
item.content:encoded: So did you buy the Santa Claus movie? I’m curious to know how bad it really was.
